name: Stranded (itch) (hoomoongoos)
description:
Explore a unique setting and experience a really, really mediocre story in this 3D/pixel-art game, that has been made during a 2 week private game-jam in a friend's discord server (we didn't meet the deadline, so give it 3-4 more days to the development time).
All of the 3D assets, textures, music and effects have been made in this short period of time (with very few exceptions).
The game takes about an hour to complete.

CREDITS
@przebot: Programming (character controller, crafting, inventory and dialogue systems), UI layout, writing.
@songaku: Enviroment art (sculpting, modelling, texturing and level design), character models and design, UI design and sprites, music/sfx, audio related programming, writing.
